message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $180. It's a one-time offer, and I think you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. How about $140? I'm ready to buy today if you're willing to work with me.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $160, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. This is a one-time opportunity for you to get a great product at a great price!
Alice, $160 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm really interested, but I can only go up to $150.  Let's meet in the middle and close this deal.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer it to you for $155. It's a fair price, considering the product's value.
